hadiths.text: Yahya bin Abi Ishaq Al-Hadrami narrated :that Anas bin Malik said: "We went with the Messenger of Allah from Al-Madinah to Makkah, and he prayed two Rak'ah." He said: "I said to Anas: 'How long did Messenger of Allah stay in Makkah?' He said: 'Ten (days)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَمْ تُقْصَرُ الصَّلاَةُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About How Long The Prayer Is Shortened
